participant_1.background:
I love listening to acoustic music, especially when I am with my daughter.
my nickname is bubblegum.
I am not the fittest person, but I run to stay healthy for my baby.
i like to pickle eggs.
I want to drive my truck to the mountains and get some alone time.

participant_2.background:
I love the feeling of freedom and adventure that comes with riding my bike.
I once pretended to be a sports fan and told the cop I was on my way to a game.
My teeth hurt from not chewing my food properly, but I have to move my army to the new camp.
i like to fly model airplanes.
I loved picking flowers from my garden with my friends and making bouquets for our moms.

content.text: Hello! I am pretty good, just had a picnic with my family. How about you?
I'm doing great! I just got done taking my daughter for a walk in the park.
That's great! I love taking walks in the park. What's your favorite thing to do there?
I love listening to the music from the band that plays there.
Oh, that sounds nice! I love listening to live music.
I also love to pick flowers and make bouquets for my mom.
That is so sweet! My mom loves flowers too.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to bike and fly model airplanes.
I love biking too! It's so much fun to feel the wind in your hair and the sun on your face.
I know, right? It's the best feeling.
What are some of your favorite places to bike?
I love biking in the mountains. It's so peaceful and beautiful.
I agree! I love the feeling of freedom and adventure that comes with riding my bike.
Me too! It's the best way to explore new places.
I think we should go biking together sometime!
That would be so much fun
